title: Melbourne
description: Melbourne is the capital of Victoria, known for its vibrant culture and diverse neighborhoods.

title: Geelong
description: Geelong is a coastal city with beautiful beaches and a strong maritime history.

title: Ballarat
description: Ballarat is famous for its gold rush history and stunning Sovereign Hill attraction.

title: Bendigo
description: Bendigo is known for its grand Victorian architecture and rich gold mining heritage.

title: Shepparton
description: Shepparton is an agricultural hub with a thriving food and wine culture.

title: Warrnambool
description: Warrnambool offers stunning coastal views and is a popular whale-watching destination.

title: Mildura
description: Mildura is located along the Murray River and is known for its citrus orchards and vineyards.

title: Castlemaine
description: Castlemaine is a charming town with a thriving arts scene and historic architecture.

title: Mornington
description: Mornington Peninsula offers beautiful beaches, wineries, and natural hot springs.

title: Lorne
description: Lorne is a coastal town on the Great Ocean Road, known for its scenic beauty and waterfalls.

title: Harcourt
description: Harcourt is a small Central Highlands town located approximately 9 km northeast of Castlemaine, known for its apple orchards.
